title: Tottenham v Villarreal: Champions League – live
summary: The Europa League holders made their comeback in a match held in north London. Fans can follow the action through a minute-by-minute report. Scott Murray is providing live updates on the game.

title: Real Madrid v Marseille, Juventus v Dortmund, and more: Champions League – live

title: Athletic Bilbao v Arsenal: Champions League – as it happened
summary: Arsenal began their campaign with a successful start, as substitutes Gabriel Martinelli and Leandro Trossard contributed to the victory at San Mames. The match was characterized by a lack of quality play. Overall, the win marked a positive opening for Arsenal.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect charged with aggravated murder; prosecutors will seek death penalty – live updates
summary: Tyler Robinson is facing charges for the fatal shooting of Charlie Kirk, as detailed by a Utah attorney. The suspect will be held without bail while the prosecution pursues the death penalty. The case highlights severe implications for Robinson given the nature of the allegations.

title: Charlie Kirk killing suspect charged with aggravated murder by Utah prosecutors
summary: Tyler Robinson has been charged with aggravated murder, felony discharge of a firearm, and witness tampering. He faces serious legal repercussions, including the possibility of the death penalty. The case underscores the severity of the alleged offenses.
